name: The Monster's Maze
description:
Overview:

Help our hero to escape alive from the evil monster and it's endless maze!

Check out the game also on GameJolt:

http://gamejolt.com/games/arcade/the-monster-s-maze/23948/

Controls:

  • Keyboard Arrows: Move;
  • WASD Keys: Move;

Observations:

  • This game was made targeting QVGA resolution (320x240).
  • This game was made for the 2014's March's "Procedural Death Jam".

Hashtags:

#proceduraldeathjam
